definition: the procedure of making some object free of live bacteria or other microorganisms, usually by heat or chemical means
details:
noun
- the procedure of making some object free of live bacteria or other microorganisms, usually by heat or chemical means
= example: the procedure of making some object free of live bacteria or other microorganisms, usually by heat or chemical means
= synonyms: sterilisation
- the act of making an organism barren or infertile
= example: the act of making an organism barren or infertile
= synonyms: sterilisation
